amendment.description: Amendment to the Clay amendments (A019) sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws necessary to protect adults from hunger or homelessness.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Clay amendments to include an exemption for laws and regulations necessary to protect adults from hunger or homelessness.Text of the amendment was not previously printed in the Congressional Record.

action.text: Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee to the Clay amendment (A019).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 285 (Roll no. 62).
